Entries.Leah_spouse: I learned all of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s techniques last year, but she's always one step ahead of me!
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. I'm just catching up with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}. Go ahead and have some fun.
Entries.Sam_spouse: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}'s the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
Entries.Demetrius: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} really works hard on her carpentry stuff... she deserves a little recognition now and then.
Entries.Caroline: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} is very serious about {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}} grange display. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}}'s been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.Evelyn: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchinni skewers, maybe?
Entries.Pam: Better hurry up, kid... Before ol' {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} here fishes every last lunker out of the tent! Hehe.$h
Entries.Jodi: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.
Entries.Leah: I really admire {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s carpentry skills. I use a lot of the same techniques in my own line of work.
Entries.Marnie: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s.$s#$e#Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.
Entries.Elliott: I'm trying to get {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} to tell me {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusGender}}}} sauce recipe, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusGender}}}} won't budge.
Entries.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.
Entries.Harvey: And just a few steps over there, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} is grilling up a batch of pork ribs... Yikes.$s#$e#I've got some soul-searching to do...$11
Entries.Marlon: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s blades get sharper every year.#$e#So do {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} prices...
